sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react' import './fnt_sze.css' let color_a:string,color_b:string,color_c:string,color_d:string; let StoredFntSze:any = localStorage.getItem('LocalFntSze') export default function Font(props:any){ const [Fntsze, SetFntsze] = React.useState(20) React.useEffect(()=>{props.fntSlct(Fntsze);}) const fntSze_a=()=>{ SetFntsze(20) } const fntSze_b=()=>{ SetFntsze(22) } const fntSze_c=()=>{ SetFntsze(24) } const fntSze_d=()=>{ SetFntsze(26) } switch (Fntsze){ case 20: color_a='red' color_b='black' color_c='black' color_d='black' break; case 22: color_a='black' color_b='red' color_c='black' color_d='black' break; case 24: color_a='black' color_b='black' color_c='red' color_d='black' break; case 26: color_a='black' color_b='black' color_c='black' color_d='red' } return (
) }
